title: Vase, ca. 1915
markings: Paper label attached to bottom (29 x 32 cm), printed in blue ink with vertical FULPER in cartouche; graphite notations "657/ Vase" and an indistinct price.
provenance:
Jordan-Volpe Gallery, New York
Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions: H x Diam: 14.3 x 22.9 cm (5 5/8 x 9 in.)
creditline: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
description: Buff stoneware body, cast. Flattened ovoid with raised neck and slightly thick rim. Exterior covered with a blue-green crystalline glaze with subtle flambe over greenish-brown glaze. Interior has mat glaze finish. Bottom glazed like exterior.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, ca. 1915.
ca. 1915. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Marcia and William Goodman. 1984-84-46.
